description: Manage linked service for log analytics workspace.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service create
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service create --linked-service-name
                                                         --resource-group
                                                         --workspace-name
                                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--resource-id]
                                                         [--tags]
                                                         [--write-access-resource-id]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service create -g MyResourceGroup -n cluster --workspace-name MyWorkspace --write-access-resource-id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/clusters/MyCluster

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service delete
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service delete [--ids]
                                                         [--linked-service-name]
                                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--resource-group]
                                                         [--subscription]
                                                         [--workspace-name]
                                                         [--yes]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service delete -g MyResourceGroup -n cluster --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service list
commands.summary: Get all the linked services in a workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service list --resource-group
                                                       --workspace-name
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service list -g MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service show
commands.summary: Show the properties of a linked service.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service show [--ids]
                                                       [--linked-service-name]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--workspace-name]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service show -g MyResourceGroup -n cluster --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service update
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service update [--add]
                                                         [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--ids]
                                                         [--linked-service-name]
                                                         [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                         [--remove]
                                                         [--resource-group]
                                                         [--resource-id]
                                                         [--set]
                                                         [--subscription]
                                                         [--tags]
                                                         [--workspace-name]
                                                         [--write-access-resource-id]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service update -g MyResourceGroup -n cluster --workspace-name MyWorkspace --write-access-resource-id /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup/providers/Microsoft.OperationalInsights/clusters/MyCluster

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace linked-service wait [--created]
                                                       [--custom]
                                                       [--deleted]
                                                       [--exists]
                                                       [--ids]
                                                       [--interval]
                                                       [--linked-service-name]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--timeout]
                                                       [--updated]
                                                       [--workspace-name]
